name: Big Fund Capital DAO
description:
Big Fund Capital DAO is a decentralized autonomous organization that works like an investment fund. In this organization, profits are shared among holders of its tokens. Funds from the treasury are allocated in a basket of investments (defi protocols, tokens, NFTs).

These investments generate revenues, which are swapped to AVAX and DIRECTLY DISTRIBUTED to holders according to their share. This means that token holders have a direct impact on the profits of the organization
